attributes.action: Reverse the Law which Bans Handguns & strengthen the law covering Posession
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People should be able to keep handguns lawfully, the only people who have them now are the criminals.
The posession laws should be really tightened up, for example simple possesion of an unlicensed gun in the home should get a mandatory 10 year jail sentance and anyone carrying an unliceneced gun in public a mandatory 25 year prison sentence, anyone using an unlicensed gun to get a mandatory 35 years, with no leave of appeal and no time of for good behaviour
